p:
The kinetic current has been calculated using the ORR polarization curves by considering the mass-transport correction using the Koutecky-Levich Equation (12) to explore the electro activity of the PdNi/C, Pd/C, and Pt/C in detail. The kinetic currents were computed in alkaline solution at 0.074 V (vs. Hg/HgO/OH âˆ’) for all materials.
